entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Kentville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 p.m. ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 9:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: ENE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to ice pellets late this evening then to freezing rain before morning. Ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 8:20 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing in the morning and dissipating in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:20 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing late in the evening and dissipating after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 8:20 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High 7. Forecast issued 8:20 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
